title: Coin Block Cake
thumbnail_alt: Cake shaped like a yellow question mark block from Super Mario.

media.caption: Cake shaped like a yellow question mark block from Super Mario.
Unfrosted square cake layers with a square cutout in the middle.
Cube-shaped cake with a slice cut out and coins spilling out from the inside.

overview: Moist yellow cake with vanilla buttercream frosting, filled with chocolate coins and styled with fondant as an iconic Mario coin block.
